mapper.insert: insert into student (name, create_at, update_at, qq, job, arrive_time, school, student_id, link, wish, known_ways, bro) values (#{name}, #{create_at}, #{update_at}, #{qq}, #{job}, #{arrive_time}, #{school}, #{student_id}, #{link}, #{wish}, #{known_ways}, #{bro})
mapper.update: update student set name = #{name}, create_at = #{create_at}, update_at = #{update_at}, qq = #{qq}, job = #{job}, arrive_time = #{arrive_time}, school = #{school}, student_id = #{student_id}, link = #{link}, wish = #{wish}, known_ways = #{known_ways}, bro = #{bro} where id = #{id}
